PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-09352014-09-18EC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PASSENGER AUTOMOBILE AND LIGHT TRUCK GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to (1) address climate change; (2) protect the environment; and (3) support the deployment of technologies that reduce Greenhouse gases emissions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0207 Publication Date: 2014-10-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the PASSENGER AUTOMOBILE AND LIGHT TRUCK GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to (1) address climate change; (2) protect the environment; and (3) support the deployment of technologies that reduce Greenhouse gases emissions.
